comments:
Build 20020124

When compiling the following code, an internal error occurs.

package p1;

public class X {
	public static void main(String[] arguments) {
		try {
		        long l = 2L;
			assert false : i;
		} catch (AssertionError e) {
			System.out.println(e.getMessage());
		}
	}
}

expressions (variable 'i' is not defined).
